DOC.brief_summary: To determine if treatment with BG00012 can decrease the number of MS relapses during a certain time period. To determine if, over time, BG00012 treatment can decrease the number of certain types of brain lesions commonly seen in MS patients and slow down the time it takes for the disease to get worse. The purpose of this study is also to determine the safety of BG00012 and how well it is tolerated. Another goal is to see what effect BG00012 may have on tests and evaluations used to assess MS.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Oral BG00012 in Relapsing-Remitting Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Key Unless otherwise specified, to be eligible to participate in this study, candidates must meet the following eligibility criteria at the time of the randomization: Must have a confirmed diagnosis of RRMS according to McDonald criteria #14. Must have a baseline EDSS between 0.0 and 5.0, inclusive. Must have relapsingremitting disease course. Key Unless otherwise specified, candidates will be excluded from study entry if any of the following exclusion criteria exist at randomization: Other chronic disease of the immune system, malignancies, acute urologic, pulmonary, gastrointestinal disease. Pregnant or nursing women. Note: Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
